title: Don’t believe this picture of PM Modi taking a dip in the river; here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture is doing rounds on social media in which Prime Minister Narendra Modi can be seen taking a dip into the river and he is being held by a few people.

ALSO READ: This picture of a kid covered in blood is NOT from…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found it to be FAKE.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture in which it was actually Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal.

The picture was taken on March 25, 2014, at Rajghat in Varanasi.

In the above FAKE vs REAL collage it is clear that PM Modi’s face was superimposed on Kejriwal’s face using photo editing software.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
